title: I feel like honor is progessing slower
body: Hey everyone :D. As title says, I feel like honor is progressing a lot slower this season. I'd say around 50 or 60% of my games I get honored but am still honor level 2. Last year I got it in around a month or two, and pretty much once every two weeks I'd go up an honor level. Anyone else noticing this change? Or maybe I'm just crazy xD.
